name: Phukein, Chole/Chana Masala And Roti! (Green Onions And Potatoes Garbanzo Bean Curry And Indian Flat Bread)
description: Phukein, Chole/Chana Masala And Roti (Green Onions and Potatoes Garbanzo Bean Curry And Indian Flat Bread). A delicious, healthy and easy weeknight dinner. Vegan and Gluten Free Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1  green chili chopped or red chili flakes to taste

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium deep pan, add the oil and heat on medium heat for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: In a medium deep pan, add the oil and heat on medium heat for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the cumin seeds and let them cook for a few seconds.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the cumin seeds and let them cook for a few seconds.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the garlic and chili and cook for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the garlic and chili and cook for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the potatoes and cook for 4-5 minutes, covered on low-medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the potatoes and cook for 4-5 minutes, covered on low-medium heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the green onions, turmeric and a little salt and cook for 10-15 minutes on low heat, stirring occasionally until potatoes are well cooked.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the green onions, turmeric and a little salt and cook for 10-15 minutes on low heat, stirring occasionally until potatoes are well cooked.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot topped with chopped cilantro leaves! Serve as part of meal with any lentil curry(Daal), or beans curry, or other soups/stews, Indian bread(Roti) and salad or any indian pickle.(my current favorite is the punjabi raw mango pickle)
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot topped with chopped cilantro leaves! Serve as part of meal with any lentil curry(Daal), or beans curry, or other soups/stews, Indian bread(Roti) and salad or any indian pickle.(my current favorite is the punjabi raw mango pickle)

recipeInstructions.text: Another way to make this, is with Boiled potatoes. Add the boiled potatoes to the pan at Step 4.
recipeInstructions.name: Another way to make this, is with Boiled potatoes. Add the boiled potatoes to the pan at Step 4.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix well to coat. Add in the green onions as well along with the salt and turmeric and mix well. Cook on low heat for 6-8 minutes since the potatoes are already cooked. The green onions look fresher and retain their shape when cooked this way! Have a fun day!
recipeInstructions.name: Mix well to coat. Add in the green onions as well along with the salt and turmeric and mix well. Cook on low heat for 6-8 minutes since the potatoes are already cooked. The green onions look fresher and retain their shape when cooked this way! Have a fun day!

keywords: easy weeknight dinner, traditional Indian meal, vegan main course
